hooks.command:
# Prevent editing on main branch for production stability
[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch. Create a feature branch (e.g., feature/property-listing, feature/user-auth) first."}' >&2; exit 2; }

# Auto-format JS/TS/Python files
file_path="${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}"
if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]]; then
  npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>&1
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Frontend formatting failed. Check file for syntax errors."}' >&2
    exit 1
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Frontend code formatted.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  fi
elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.py$ ]]; then
  cd backend && python -m black "$(basename "$file_path")" 2>&1
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Backend formatting failed. Check Python syntax."}' >&2
    exit 1
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Backend Python code formatted.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  fi
fi

# Auto-install frontend dependencies
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ frontend/package\.json$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Installing frontend dependencies..."}' >&2
  cd frontend && npm install >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '{"feedback": "Frontend dependencies installed.", "suppressOutput": true}' || {
    echo '{"feedback": "Failed to install frontend dependencies."}' >&2
    exit 1
  }
fi

# Auto-install backend dependencies
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ backend/requirements\.txt$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Installing backend dependencies..."}' >&2
  cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '{"feedback": "Backend dependencies installed.", "suppressOutput": true}' || {
    echo '{"feedback": "Failed to install backend dependencies."}' >&2
    exit 1
  }
fi

# Run tests for real estate components
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.test\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Running real estate component tests..."}' >&2
  cd frontend && npm test -- --findRelatedTests "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}" --passWithNoTests 2>&1 | tail -30
  exit_code=${PIPESTATUS[0]}
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Real estate component tests passed."}'
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Tests failed. Check property logic and user flows."}' >&2
  fi
elif [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ backend/.*test.*\.py$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Running backend API tests..."}' >&2
  cd backend && python -m pytest "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}" -v 2>&1 | tail -30
  exit_code=${PIPESTATUS[0]}
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "Backend API tests passed."}'
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "Backend tests failed. Check API endpoints and database logic."}' >&2
  fi
fi

# TypeScript check with real estate context
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Checking TypeScript types for real estate components..."}' >&2
  cd frontend && output=$(npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1)
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "No TypeScript errors in real estate components.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  else
    errors=$(echo "$output" | grep -A 2 "error TS" | head -30)
    if [ -n "$errors" ]; then
      echo '{"feedback": "TypeScript errors found in real estate components:"}' >&2
      echo "$errors" >&2
    fi
  fi
  exit 0
fi
